title: Bolt: The Robo-Dog Companion
prompt: Write a short story about a robot dog
preview: Bolt: The Robo-Dog Companion The Gift of Technology On a rainy afternoon, 10-year-old Maya received a package from her grandfatherâ€™s tech lab.
